description.p: Invite people to create their own TransForm user accounts. When any of the invitees accept their invitation they are automatically added to the TransForm account associated with the API key.

argument.name: usersToInvite
argument.description: email addresses of people to invite

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

description.p: This method takes a CRLF delimited list of people to invite. Each row in the CRLF delimited list has a format that matches one of the following formats:

section.example: emailAddress User Display name (emailAddress) User Display name (emailAddress)|userRoles

description.p: The list of userRoles is optional. If no user roles are specified the person will be assigned a role of 'user'. You can also optionally create the User Account without first sending out an invitation by using this format:
